backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing file storage, folders, user profiles, notes, missions, and authorization with pagination and diagnostics.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking specific frontend files to implemented folder‑creation and swipe‑action features with metadata and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation describing creation of Draft baseline synced 1:1 with Live v114, including validation steps and change‑control rules.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry for the app with PWA metadata, icons, and script loading the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Freeze notice prohibiting code changes after restoring Live v114 until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and display properties.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network‑first fetch handling.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying all frontend files and behaviors match Live v114 after restoration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up theming and providers and shows either an intro screen after login or the home page.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and technical info toggling.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG camera icon with hover animations and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative bottom line for UI styling.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog prompting users to retry opening or download a file when external opening is blocked.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a dialog for previewing different file types and provides actions like open, download, delete, and move to folder.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Provides a drag‑and‑drop or click‑to‑upload section that uploads files with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI, showing a folder icon and handling disabled state.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Dialog for listing, creating, renaming, selecting, and deleting folders with swipe actions and validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen viewer for navigating, previewing, sharing, deleting, and moving files with swipe navigation.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a file gallery with selection, long‑press actions, previews, downloads, and full‑screen viewing.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, identity menu, sign‑out action, and a gallery icon with progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays an animated welcome screen that triggers an onComplete callback after timed transitions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a button to sign in using Internet Identity, showing a loading spinner during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Shows and edits a mission’s details with task management, progress calculation, saving, and deletion controls.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating a new mission with title and tasks, including validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions interface using an animated target icon.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Displays the full missions list with creation, swipe actions, deletion, and navigation into mission details.
frontend/src/components/NotesButton.tsx: Floating button that opens the notes interface using an animated notes icon.
frontend/src/components/NotesFullScreenV: Full-screen notes manager supporting creation, editing, deletion, and mobile-friendly editor behavior.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog component for moving selected files into folders or back to the main collection using folder-related mutations.
Row component enabling swipe-to-reveal edit and delete actions with touch and mouse gesture handling.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a unified progress bar showing overall upload progress and file count from the UploadContext.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding, description, and login button for Internet Identity sign‑in.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization, retry logic, error states, and sign‑out handling for authenticated interactions.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides upload batch tracking, progress aggregation, and functions to start, update, and complete uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth flow, storing and loading identities, tracking login status, and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Hook detecting whether the device uses a coarse (touch) pointer to adapt UI behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting missions via the backend actor with cache invalidation and diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes with sorting, cache updates, and delete diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for managing files and folders, including listing, fetching by folder, and creating or renaming folders.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and component accent colors.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main page orchestrating authentication states and UI sections including files, folders, notes, and missions views.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines actor initialization error messages and helpers to classify errors such as not-ready, failed init, invalid admin token, or stopped canister.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides utilities to open external URLs in a new tab and to download files via fetch and blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, choosing in-app viewer, office preview, or direct download.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Categorizes files by MIME type and generates labels to support in-app preview behavior.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Formats timestamps into human-readable relative times or short dates.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Offers diagnostics for React Query caches and logs lifecycle details during delete mutations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and sessionStorage parameters, including retrieval, persistence, and safe removal from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list enumerating all frontend files that define the Live v114 baseline.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current features, versions, and overall architecture for MyGallery.
